description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans various domains, including decentralization, digital landscapes, and regenerative design. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his diverse interests, covering topics like ecosystem architecture, innovation practices, and the evolution of digital spaces. He advocates for aligning technology with nature and human values, emphasizing collaboration and sustainability in his approach to building thriving communities and organizations.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends tech and philosophy to transform education and digital spaces. Based in Taipei, he advocates for inclusive internet ecosystems and sustainable innovation practices.
